## Library

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(SDPDmod)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv("타겟도시.csv", header=T, fileEncoding="cp949")
data
```

```{r}
data1 = data
data1[,3] = sqrt(data[,3])
data1
```

```{r}
mahalanobis(data1[,c(2,3)], c(0,0), cov(data1[,c(2,3)]))
```

## 표준화 거리

```{r}
dist(scale(rbind(c(0,0),data1[,c(2,3)])))
```
